segments.text: Excuse me . Does this hotel have a fitness facility ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we try to accommodate all needs of our patrons , including fitness .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Where is your fitness facility located ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The gym is just below the lobby . Take the elevator or the stairs . You can't miss it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there an additional surcharge for the gym ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , the gym is free to guests . Take your room key , however , so you can get in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time is the gym open , and what time does it close ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The gym is open seven days a week , twenty-four hours a day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you offer trainer services along with the gym ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately , no . If you want a trainer , you'll have to use another gym .
segments.speaker: S2
